title: Calories in Spam Musubi
meta_description: Discover calories in spam musubi, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, and easy recipe tweaks for this Hawaiian favorite.
assumptions: Standard recipe: one 1-oz grilled spam slice, 100g cooked rice, nori wrap; no extra sauces or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, portion size, rice type, and preparation; check labels or recipes for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One spam musubi provides about 250 kcal, with notable sodium from the spam.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one spam musubi?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard spam musubi.

faqs.q: Is spam musubi high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 800 mg sodium per musubi, mainly from the spam.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in spam musubi?
faqs.a: Around 35 g carbs, mostly from the rice.

faqs.q: How much protein in spam musubi?
faqs.a: About 8 g protein per musubi, from the spam and rice.

faqs.q: Can I make spam musubi lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for low-sodium spam or smaller portions to reduce calories and fat.
